data.title: I love 'em
data.text:
Amazing service, fast and great food too! So polite, and they make suggestions to ensure you'll ove it, like grilling, or special sauce-
They treat you like regulars, they seem to retain staff, so you don't have a new face every time you get lunch or dinner. I've always been impressed. When they where carring low carb bread and brownies years ago I really love them!!

data.title: My favorite subs
data.text: Love the Blimpies Best among all the good choices of breads and condiments like green peppers and thinly sliced cukes
